sp_widget.name: Featured Apps
sp_widget.template:
Available Mobile Apps
Learn More

Yammer

Yammer application allows you to connect and engage with team members across the enterprise to share ideas and experiences, ask each other questions, and create or join communities of interest.
Learn More

Sparq

Sparq is UnitedHealth Group's mobile app for employees that puts what you need at your fingertips, helps you stay informed with industry and company news, and keeps you connected to other team members.
Learn More

Authenticator

The Microsoft Authenticator application provides the ability to authenticate more seamlessly into each of the other Microsoft applications. This is the first application that should be configured when setting up the Office 365 Mobile applications.
Learn More

Teams

The Microsoft Teams application offers persistent chat, file sharing, meeting, and other collaboration features from a mobile device.
Learn More

Outlook

The Microsoft Outlook application offers an alternative mobile mail client to Boxer. It provides the ability to access your email, calendar, and contacts. The Outlook mobile application requires your mailbox to have been moved to Exchange Online. Check here to determine your Exchange version.
Learn More

To Do

To do application allows users to create, track and sync task lists across multiple devices.
Learn More

SharePoint

The Microsoft SharePoint application provides access to your SharePoint Online sites. SharePoint Online sites are ones with a URL following the format "https://uhgazure.sharepoint.com/*". You will be able to view files saved in SharePoint Online sites and edit them by choosing to open the files in other applications.
Learn More

OneNote

The Microsoft OneNote application provides the ability to view and edit OneNote Notebooks that have been saved in your OneDrive. You may also create new OneNote Notebooks.
Learn More

Microsoft Office

Microsoft Office brings you Word, Excel, and PowerPoint all in one app. Take advantage of a seamless experience with Microsoft tools on the go with the Office app, the simple solution for productivity.
Scan PDF files, create spreadsheets, or draft up documents anytime and anywhere by accessing integrated Office features through your mobile device. From Word documents, PowerPoint presentations or Excel files, the Office app provides you with one seamless experience.
Learn More

Microsoft Edge

Microsoft Edge application is a modern internet browser made by Microsoft, which is designed to replace Internet Explore for web browsing and access to applications.
